thread.title: Malaysia Airlines announces Leadership changesTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Malaysia Airlines announces Leadership changesTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Malaysia Airlines announces Leadership changes
Malaysia Airlines Berhad (MAB) today officially announced the appointment of its interim Head of Revenue Management, Proteek Sengupta.
Proteek started his career in Malaysia Airlines in the Revenue Management department and is currently Head of Network Strategy and Planning for MAB. He will lead the efforts to improve the revenue efficiency and network design for MAB.
Proteek will assume the position from Shihaj Abdulla Kutty with immediate effect while the on-going search to identify a suitable successor, both internally and externally, is concluded.
Malaysia Airlines thanks Shihaj Kutty for his service to the airline and wishes him the best in his future endeavours.
